entry.title: Mini Collectible - 15cm Black & Purple Anime Sword
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 149.00

Command the might of a legendary swordsman with this striking 15cm metal katana, directly inspired by Roronoa Zoro's iconic sword, Shusui, from One Piece! This beautifully crafted miniature blade features a sleek black sheath adorned with a distinctive purple circular pattern, perfectly capturing the unique design of the "Black Blade." The hilt is black with a bold gold guard, adding to its authentic samurai aesthetic.

While an excellent decorative collectible for your desk, shelf, or display cabinet, its robust metal construction and attached chain/keyring also allow it to be used as a unique and eye-catching keychain. A must-have for fans of One Piece and especially the master swordsman Zoro, this piece perfectly combines utility with intricate anime aesthetics.

entry.title: Naruto Anime Inspired Black Metal Kunai - 15cm Collectible Ninja Tool
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 99.00

Step into the world of Shinobi with this impressive 15cm metal kunai, inspired by the iconic ninja tools from the Naruto series! This collectible features a sleek black finish with "NARUTO" emblazoned in red on the blade. Its design, with four distinct finger holes on the handle, is reminiscent of the unique weapons wielded by characters like Asuma Sarutobi.

Perfect for display on your desk, shelf, or as part of your anime collection, this metal kunai is a must-have for any dedicated Naruto fan. Its robust construction makes it a striking decorative piece.

Show off your love for Jujutsu Kaisen with this adorable Nobara Kugisaki Chibi Keychain! Featuring Nobara’s iconic outfit and a fierce yet cute expression, this keychain is perfect for anime fans who want to carry a piece of their favorite series wherever they go. It comes with a matching orange strap adorned with Japanese characters and a shiny gold bell charm for an extra touch of style.

  • Character: Nobara Kugisaki (Jujutsu Kaisen)

  • Height (Character): ~6-7 cm

  • Features: Chibi-style figure, keyring with strap and bell

Add a touch of anime flair to your everyday look with this fun Nobara keychain!
